mapper.insert: insert into recipe (name, serveamount, preparationTime, cookingTime, image_url) values (#{recipe.recipeName}, #{recipe.serveAmount}, #{recipe.preparationTime}, #{recipe.cookingTime}, #{recipe.imageUrl})
mapper.select: select recipe_id as recipeId, name as recipeName, serveamount as serveAmount, preparationTime, cookingTime, image_url as imageUrl from recipe order by recipe_id asc
select recipe_id as recipeId, name as recipeName, serveamount as serveAmount, preparationTime, cookingTime,image_url as imageUrl from recipe where name like concat('%', #{recipeName}, '%')
